headline.main: JAPAN OPENS DRIVE IN SOUTHERN HONAN; Chinese Report Foe in a Vigorous New Offensive Move

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, April 30 (AP) -- The Japanese Army has launched a vigorous offensive in Southern Honan Province, thrusting several columns west and northwest from Sinyang, important railway town 150 miles north of Hankow, a Chinese military spokesman said today.
abstract: Japanese open new drive from Sinyang, south Honan; bomb Sian and area airdromes
